description:
Hino Akane is Miyuki`s classmate and a member of the school`s volleyball team. She is from Osaka and her parents run an okonomiyaki shop. Akane may be a jokester, but when she has a goal set, she can be very passionate about achieving it. Her catchphrase is "No, no!" in Kansai dialect. Her potential as a Pretty Cure awakened when she wanted to pay back Miyuki for her help and protect her. As Cure Sunny, her dark red hair brightens to orange and grows longer before tying into a bun, and her theme color is orange. She can manipulate fire in this form and gains super strength.
She introduces herself as "The brilliant sun, hot-blooded power! Cure Sunny!"
name: Hino Akane
